top_comments.comment: Only swedish and finnish will know what EI SAA PEITTÄÄ means.
I recommend you add little amethyst geodes around the walls indented into the walls or some form of fungi like mushrooms growing out of little cliff side off the walls :) :)

comments_since_last_sample.body: I'm only 3 mins into the video but Mr iskall man. you should hire gem to build some trees for you.
I love your intros dude it's always random and it feels like I've been watching halfway through the video at the beginning
You can use moss carpet on the grass to help with the mobs.
You should turn the mother into a real carved statue to make is more enchanting
